actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drake makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack, or it makes two Book Flap attacks.

actions.name: Bite (Dragon Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Book Flap (Book Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the drake can fly up to 15 feet without provoking opportunity attacks, as it flaps its pages.

actions.name: Claw (Dragon Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shredded Breath (Dragon Form Only; Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The drake exhales sharp shreds of paper in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 10 (4d4) slashing damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't blinded.

special_abilities.name: Bibliophile
special_abilities.desc: The paper drake understands any written language it can see, provided it is touching the surface on which the words are written.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance (Book Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: While the drake remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary book.
